meanings.definition: The state or quality of being nothing; nonexistence.
meanings.sent1: In the dark cave, there was a feeling of nothingnesses that surrounded us.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house was filled with a sense of eerie nothingnesses.
meanings.sent3: When the magician waved his wand, the rabbit disappeared into nothingnesses!
meanings.sent4: The fog enveloped the city, shrouding it in a cloak of nothingnesses.
meanings.sent5: As the last note of the song faded away, there was a moment of complete nothingnesses in the room.

meanings.definition: A state of complete emptiness or absence.
meanings.sent1: The vast desert stretched out before us, a sea of endless nothingnesses.
meanings.sent2: After the storm passed, the sky cleared to reveal a peaceful nothingnesses.
meanings.sent3: The fridge was a void of nothingnesses, not a single snack in sight!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a blank canvas, a white expanse of nothingnesses waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned warehouse echoed with the eerie sound of nothingnesses, a haunting emptiness.
